section.title: Installation Overview
section.para: This guide refers to the following types of hosts:

listitem.para: A Deployer with dual roles. It is the starting point for invoking the deployment socok8s scripts and Ansible playbooks. It is the access point to your Kubernetes cluster. A deployer can be a continuous integration (CI) node, a laptop, or a dedicated VM.
A series of nodes: administration node, master, workers.
